description: This file defines the Player class, which models a player in a Ludo game, including properties such as name, color, ai control flag, turn order, and associated room. It includes annotations for ORM mapping to a database table 'players'.

classes.name: Player
classes.description: Entity class representing a player in a game room with attributes for identity, display name, color, AI control, turn order, and associated room.

methods.name: Player(String name, String color, boolean ai, int turnOrder)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to initialize a Player with specific attributes.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the player.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the display name of the player.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the display name of the player.

methods.name: getColor
methods.description: Returns the color assigned to the player.

methods.name: setColor
methods.description: Sets the color of the player.

methods.name: isAi
methods.description: Returns whether the player is AI-controlled.

methods.name: setAi
methods.description: Sets whether the player is AI-controlled.

methods.name: getTurnOrder
methods.description: Returns the turn order position for the player.

methods.name: setTurnOrder
methods.description: Sets the turn order position for the player.

methods.name: getRoom
methods.description: Returns the Room object associated with the player.

methods.name: setRoom
methods.description: Sets the Room object associated with the player.
